questions.q: Which of the following is the most common cause of conductive hearing loss in children?
questions.explanation: Otitis media with effusion is the most common cause of conductive hearing loss in children

questions.q: What is the most common type of head and neck cancer?
questions.C: Squamous cell carcinoma of oral cavity
questions.explanation: Squamous cell carcinoma of the oral cavity is the most common type of head and neck cancer
